title: Kate Berlant & Jacqueline Novak | Republicans Try to Dismiss Trump’s Second Impeachment Trial: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Republicans admitting they will do everything possible to sabotage the Democrats’ agenda while moving quickly to quash the impeachment trial of former President Donald Trump.

Then, Kate Berlant and Jacqueline Novak discuss their podcast POOG and the wellness industry.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
